DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Interaction Between Aspirin Nexium
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent prior study specific procedure . Healthy male female subject age 18 75 year suitable vein cannulation repeat vein puncture . Healthy female subject must nonchildbearing potential ( postmenopausal , hysterectomy and/or bilateral oophorectomy ) childbearing potential negative serum hCG pregnancy test screen use follow method birth control : Continuously practice abstinence screen throughout duration study Clinically accept contraception describe item 7 Section 5.1 hormonal contraceptive . Have body mass index ( BMI ) 19 30 kg/m2 No clinically significant abnormal finding judge Investigator enrollment physical exam . Involvement plan and/or conduct study ( applies AstraZeneca staff and/or staff study site ) Previous enrolment randomisation present study . History clinically significant disease disorder , opinion investigator , may either put subject risk participation study , influence result subject 's ability participate study e.g . history bleed disorder , excessive bruising ongoing history liver disease History presence clinically significant gastrointestinal e.e . GI ulcer , hepatic renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug . Any clinically significant illness within 4 week first administration investigational product .
